MY TOP 3 OPENING FOR FALL 2019

Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Op

Gurenge by liSA

Singer LiSA's opening theme song "Gurenge" for the Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba anime was certified platinum by the Japan Record Association on September 22. "Gurenge" (Red Lotus) has exceeded 300,000 downloads, the first track by a female artist to do so this year.

Enen no Shouboutai OP

Inferno by Mrs.GREEN APPLE

The darkness that illuminates the days we have become accustomed to walking. It's glaring, and it's a habit of where we were used to walking. A gentle melody to remind those who lead the flame. If you don't have eternity, say no, it's also good laughing, if it shines, someday the light will be extinguished.The toy that makes a sound and the magic that hurts pain are all treasures for me There's no eternity We'll walk until the day when the fire of life disappears.
